casebody.data:
SIGMUND LINDLER, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. LEOPOLD SOLOMON et al., Defendants and Appellants.

Before Monell, Curtis, and Sedgwick, ■ JJ.

Decided November 29, 1873. Thomas Darlington, for respondent.

Opinion by Curtis, J. Monell and Sedgwick, JJ., concurred.

Action for dissolution of a copartnership.

Appeal from a judgment in favor of plaintiff.

Judgment affirmed in part, and vacated as to residue.

Edward Maokinley, for appellants.
